thread.section_title: Ties.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ties.com | www.ties.com
thread.title: Stephen Simmons

author: Stephen Simmons
title: Stephen Simmons
text:
I purchased 12 different pairs of socks for my groomsmen/bridal party for a wedding. Love the socks! Not pleased... (can't say urinated off) that after I purchased 120$ in socks I received emails saying spend 50$ and get two pairs for free or something of the similar.
Great selection/shipping/pricing.... discount email blasts after purchase are frustrating.
